Al Jazeera Live By Alastair McCready Umut Uras and Usaid Siddiqui Iranian missiles have targeted sites across Israel killing at least three people and injuring dozens in retaliation for ongoing Israeli attacks on Iran. Iran says Israel has killed at least 78 people including women and children and wounded more than 320 others as the Israeli military continues to launch strikes on cities military sites and nuclear facilities.
